name: Fighting Pit
description: An underground venue for illegal combat; adventurers can participate in fights, place bets on matches, or rescue captives forced to fight.
atmosphere: The pit has a dark, dangerous atmosphere with the sound of brutal combat and the excited whispers of illegal gambling. The air carries the scent of blood, sweat, and the metallic tang of violence. The atmosphere crackles with the thrill of forbidden entertainment and the constant threat of discovery.
